provider_attribute_type.name: Default Location
provider_attribute_type.description: The location which is assigned to a clinical provider

provider_attribute_type.description: The category of the Contract for a Provider

person_attribute_type.description: Group of persons related by common descent or heredity

person_attribute_type.description: Location of persons birth

person_attribute_type.name: Citizenship
person_attribute_type.description: Country of which this person is a member

person_attribute_type.name: Mother's Name
person_attribute_type.description: First or last name of this person's mother

person_attribute_type.name: Marital Status
person_attribute_type.description: Marital status of this person

person_attribute_type.name: Health Center
person_attribute_type.description: Specific Location of this person's home health center

person_attribute_type.name: email
person_attribute_type.description: Email Address

person_attribute_type.name: Telephone Number
person_attribute_type.description: The telephone number for the person

person_attribute_type.name: Unknown patient
person_attribute_type.description: Used to flag patients that cannot be identified during the check-in process

person_attribute_type.name: Test Patient
person_attribute_type.description: Flag to describe if the patient was created to a test or not

person_attribute_type.name: FingerPrint
person_attribute_type.description: This attribute is the type for person attributed which stores the ugandaemrfingerprint template

person_attribute_type.description: Alternate Telephone number

person_attribute_type.description: Person's Father's name

person_attribute_type.description: Care givers name to the patient

person_attribute_type.name: Care giver's Telephone Number
person_attribute_type.description: The telephone number of the person giving care

person_attribute_type.name: Common Name
person_attribute_type.description: This is the widely used name when referring to the patient

person_attribute_type.name: Land Mark Feature
person_attribute_type.description: This is an easily visible feature when looking for the location of the patient

person_attribute_type.name: Directions to Patient's Home
person_attribute_type.description: Detailed description of how one can get to the location of the patient

person_attribute_type.description: The Nationality of the patient
